CustomField.description: Estimated spend on Other spends for this Event. Any categories added to B&E will rollup (summarize) to this field. Populated automatically from related Budget & Expense records but can be overridden if entered directly. Updates to B&E records will overwrite manual field entries though.

CustomField.label: Other Budget
